summary:
I am an enthusiastic and highly skilled test specialist and scrum master. I have experience in testing mobile applications across all platforms, front-end web applications. I have also tested web-apps with admin panel build in Liferay & Sharepoint platforms. I have experience in backend testing like database testing. I have knowledge of API testing and data warehouse testing. I have tested applications build in Arabic, Dutch languages. As a scrum master, I have experience in coaching scrum teams and facilitating scrum events. I am very proactive in sharing scrum knowledge with the team and mentoring/coaching team members. I have experience in leading test teams; creating test strategy, test planning and coordinating test activities between teams situated at remote (international) locations.

I have experience in Banking, Insurance (BFSI), Capital Markets and Health Care domains. I have deep understanding of SDLC, STLC, Test Strategy, Test Planning and scrum. I have worked in DevOps, CI-CD environment and has experience in releasing apps biweekly to the production.
 
I have strong analytical and problem solving skills. I am very social, always open for discussion, a good team player and always had a healthy relationship with development team. I am very vocal in team meetings and always helped scrum team with my constructive feedbacks. Wherever I worked, I have always been appreciated for bringing joy and good atmosphere in the team. I like to spend my free time with my family and friends. I love to go with the flow, enjoys cooking, playing cricket, playing football and likes dancing.

projects.title: Philips Hue Lightings
projects.description:
In this project, we are maintaining and enhancing complex mobile app which controls the lights. Philips Hue is a line of color changing LED lamps and white bulbs created by Philips. The Hue system was marketed as the first iOS controlled lighting appliance. It uses the Zigbee lighting protocol to communicate and can be controlled via smartphone apps over Wi-Fi via a Zigbee–Wi‑Fi bridge.

This app interacts with a lot of hardware like bridges, switches, sensors, remote control etc. and hence is challenging to test end to end functionality. I am involved in sprint planning, test estimation of testing stories for the sprints. I & product owner review the enhancements requests and write the acceptance criteria for the stories. I then create test cases and do the impact analysis. I am responsible for functional test execution on iOS & Android devices, iOS watch etc. Also, I verify that the correct request is being sent for each action on the app using "Charles" tool. For regression testing, we are using Calabash as a test automation tool. I verify Calabash report and re execute failed scenarios manually. I use JIRA for sprint planning, defect management, document controls and pulling out reports like "Burn down chart",  "Velocity Report" etc.

projects.title: Menzis - Anderzorg (Menzis Declaration App.)
projects.description: "Anderzorg" was the declaration app (native iOS & Android) for Menzis clients. App has “Dashboard” screen by which user can submit the declaration, view already submitted declarations, attach receipts etc. After 1st demo of the app, the client was not happy and reported major crashes and critical issues client. I joined the team after a couple of demos. I performed root cause analysis of defects reported by the client. I found that majority of defects were because of unclear requirements. I understood all the requirements from product owner, added a detailed functional description for available tasks in JIRA and created the functional spec for the team. I explained requirements to developers and worked closely with them to implement functionality correctly. I was instrumental in understanding requirements in detail, suggesting improvement in the app and finding defects. I did functional and non-functional testing of an app on 8+ Android and iOS devices and removed defects from the system. The client was happy to see the app without defects. The client has only suggested improvements or new changes as they didn’t find any defects in UAT phase.

projects.title: Prorail Geoweb App
projects.description: I created proposal for testing assignment for ProRail client for the qualification testing of Geo web app on all android, iOS and windows devices. It is accepted by Pro-Rail and I won my first assignment with ProRail. I created test plan, test estimation and complete test strategy for this assignment.I created test cases, performed functional testing and non-functional testing on mobiles and tablets and raised some good quality defects in JIRA.I created test metrics like execution reports, test results and test status reports for clients. I was remarkable in understanding the functional flow of the application; user stories in spite the fact that everything was in Dutch. I did the regression testing on total of 30+ devices in two weeks time and delivered app without defect. His efforts were well appreciated by ProRail product owner.

projects.title: E2-Markel Corporation
projects.description:
Domain		:  Insurance (Excess and Umbrella)
Technologies : .Net, DB2 
Software & Tools	: Quality Center ALM, JIRA, 
Application		: Web-based
Role		:  Acting Lead and the Team Member


Markel’s Wholesale division provides creative insurance solutions for over 15 lines of business, including commercial property and casualty, medical malpractice, professional liability, excess and umbrella, management liability, Data Breachsm and more.

In this project, I was involved in testing E2 application of Markel related to Excess & Umbrell product. In this application broker submit new deal and underwriter can perform action quote, bind, issue, endorsement etc. I was involved in testing related activities such as creation of test cases and their reviews, Creation of test data, Test execution as per test plan, defect reporting, status reporting and defect retesting.

projects.title: Jive To LIferay Migration – MSCI INC.
projects.description:
Domain		: Capital Markets
Technologies		: JAVA, HTML  
Software & Tools	: JIRA, LIFERAY
Application		: Desktop, Mobiles and Tablet Application
Role		: QA

Description:  In this project, we have migrated existing password-protected content and functionality from Jive to Liferay and take advantage of the new platform to offer additional advantages, in particular close integration with the public pages on the same website (msci.com) and the Index Client Site (index.msci.com).

Responsibilities:

•	Learnt Liferay tool functionalities.
•	Created pages, web contents, breadcrumbs, left level navigation etc. to build functional QA site.
•	Developed test plan, and QA estimation
•	Analyzed business requirement and system specifications approved by client
•	Created and mapped requirements extracted from functional specification in Excel sheet
•	Developed test scenario and test cases
•	Performed Functional and UI testing
•	Involved in test execution and defect management
•	Tracked defects and reported status in JIRA.
•	Conducted daily scrum calls and standup meetings with developers/ onshore lead
•	Created daily status report and shared with onsite and management team

projects.title: Acuity KOL-360 (Visual-A)
projects.description:
Domain		: Health Care 
Technologies		: .Net, HTML  
Software & Tools	: TFS for Sprint Cycle Management and Defect Reporting
Application		: Desktop, Mobiles and Tablet Application
Role		: Acting Lead and the Team Member

Acuity KOL-360 is aimed at building admin and client sites. It is a web based application for managing and developing relations with key opinion leaders of pharmaceutical industry. In admin site you can enter and manage information of the health experts. Client site is the application with which user will search for the expert by applying some filter so that it appropriate expert matching to their needs gets fetched.

This is a high-pressure and fast-paced project with strict deadlines.

projects.title: Digital Media Technologies Dubai
projects.description:
Domain: Digital Media
Software Tools: JIRA, Sharepoint
Application : Desktop, Mobiles and Tablet Application
Role		: Acting Lead and the Team Member

DMTD view technology as the tool by which creative minds in digital media apply visual communication, innovation, and solutions. Businesses across industries and countries depend on advanced technology based digital solutions to deliver a product or service. DMTD specialize in the ability to deliver that experience through the digital landscape. DMTD provides solution in Digital Production, Content Management, Digital Application Development, and Information Services.

Under this project, I worked on different mini-projects mentioned below duration of 1-2 months.I have handled all the QA activities for these projects:

1) AL-Futtaim Automotive Group 
      -  Static Website - 2 Month Duration
2) L and M Penalty Shoot Out 
      - Game testing on iOS and android devices- 1 Month Duration
3) Abu Dhabi Islamic Bank 
     -  SharePoint platform -  3 Month Duration
4) BreakDoubt-Indonesia 
     - iPad Game - 1 Month Duration
5) Continental
     -  PHP platform - 1 Month Duration
6) HashTag 
    - PHP platform - 2 Month Duration

projects.title: Premier AEM (Activity Exception Manager.)
projects.description:
Domain		: Core Banking
Technologies		: .Net, DB2, Mainframe 
Software & Tools	: Issue Tracker, I-Series, Log Viewer. Cross Database Studio, Cognos, Beyond Compare
Application		: Web-based
Role		: Lead of the Module & Team Member

The Activity Exception Manager (AEM) represented an enterprise-wide exception identification solution for financial institutions. AEM is a solution strategy focused on mining and interpreting data related to new account setup or file maintenance events from the AMS audit solution and comparing these events to the pre-defined product specifications defined in the Premier core solution today. This solution represented an enterprise wide exception identification solution for financial institutions and was a component within the Exception Management (EM) product suite aligned with industry trends toward applying analytical intelligence to operational workflow solutions. This project included an online reporting interface to filter or sort events by exception type for accounts or customers. Reports were created that can be downloaded to director with event items that banks need to know in order to handle due diligence for risk. It also includes sending these events to the Activity Exception Manager platform for further audit and analysis purpose, as well as having the ability to take further action online whenever necessary.

projects.title: Premier BOB (Business Online Banking.)
projects.description:
Domain		: Core Banking
Technologies		: .Net, DB2, Mainframe 
Software & Tools	: Issue Tracker, I-Series, Log Viewer
Application		: Web-based
Role		: Lead of the Module & Team Member


BOB is a product used by corporate user where they can manage their cash position. It has mainly two parts; access manager (Admin side) and Ecorp & Ecom (user side). Through BOB you can initiate ACH transfer, delete ACH transfer, inquire ACH transfer, can make ACH template for future transaction and can perform several of operation as per the need. They can also use cash position tool to see various account details at single login and can also see how the flow of money is going on.

Qualification testing is mainly performed on two products of BOB; one is Business Online (Ecorp) for corporate user and one is Retail online (Ecom) for consumer user. Qualification Testing is the Testing of the applications on different browsers.

projects.title: MetLife IB QA- eNew Business
projects.description:
Platform		: Windows 2007
Domain		: Life Insurance
Technologies : .Net, DB2 
Software & Tools	: Visual Source Safe & Quality Center 9.0. 
Application		: Web-based
Role		: Team Member & Lead of the Module


MetLife currently provides its services to over & million customers in US and around the globe. The Insurance sector has enormous potential, largely due to the ever increasing demand for more and better financial security.

MetLife IB QA- eNew Business Project provides support to MetLife in QA related activities such as creation of test cases and their reviews, Creation of test data, Test execution as per test plan, defect reporting, status reporting and defect retesting.

profile_positions.description:
Via Sogeti, I have worked with ProRail for testing  Dutch web-app ("geoweb.prorail.nl"),  "Menzis-Anderzorg" Dutch Native app, "Philips Hue Lighting" mobile app and with Toshiba Tec as a agile test expert and scrum master. I am currently working with Philips Vital Health as a Scrum Master.

 
• Mobile Apps Testing (Native, Hybrid & Web App)
• Mobile Apps Test Automation (Appium)
• Web Test Automation (Selenium, Serenity BDD, Cucumber, Testng framework)
• API Testing  (JMeter, PostMan)
• Performance Testing , Performance Monitoring (JMeter, Grafana, Telegraf, InfluxDB)
• Working in Agile Continuous integration infrastructure (Jenkins, GitHub).
• Certified Scrum Master
• Coaching scrum teams and facilitating scrum events.
• Functional testing & Non Functional testing like Interruption, Network, Localization testing etc.
• Exploratory testing, Regression Testing, Usability testing & Compatibility testing
• Test Coordination, Test Planning, Test Estimations & Test Management
• Requirement Gathering & Analysis
• Creating Test Charters
• Creating Test Scripts in Gherkin 
• Test Reporting & Test Coordination with stakeholders (at different locations)
• Test execution and defect management using JIRA, Azure, TFS
• Conducting CCB, Root cause analysis.
• Coaching young/new Professionals
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
• Lead of the module (Team of 4)
• Involved in Requirement Gathering and FSD Creation, Walk-through of FSD to client and entire project team
• Development of test plan and QA Estimation, providing Walk-through of test plan to client and project management team
• Sprint planning using  TFS and JIRA.
• Analysis of Business Requirement.
• Creating & mapping Requirements in Quality Center and in Excel.
• Development of test scenario & test cases in Excel and upload them to Quality Center.
• Test execution in Quality Center & Defect Management - in JIRA, Issue Tracker, TFS and   Quality Center.
• Test application on different desktops (windows and Mac), IOS and Android Mobiles & Tablets
• Test penalty shoot out game on iOS and android devices.
• Testing and administration of Liferay portal i.e. create pages, web contents, breadcrumbs, left level navigation etc. to build functional QA site.
• Writing & executing SQL queries to to test schema, functions, triggers, views and data in database.
• Writing & executing Unix commands for verifying logs and tracing other activities.
• Co-ordination with various stakeholders like QA Lead (Client), AD team and Business Team involved with project.
• Direct Interaction with Client for estimation, module management, creation, execution & reporting. 
• As a Module Lead I was responsible for Task Allocation and other module management activities like resource allocation, task management, Status Reporting, Metrics preparation and Overall Project Health Analysis
• Knowledge Sharing and Ramp up for new team member followed by Query session and Documentation.
• Daily Scrum Call and Stand-Up meetings with Developers
• Skype video call with client whenever required and the Weekly project status update meeting with client and management team
• Create Daily and Weekly Status Report and share with onsite Business partner and the Management Team.
